pr_title: RHDM-1016: [DMN Designer] Scroll Bars are not updated when keyboard is used for navigation

timeline.bodyText: You can probably make this the interface GridLienzoScrollable instead of GridLienzoPanel?
timeline.author: manstis

timeline.bodyText: @danielzhe Just curious, why is this indirection required?
timeline.author: yesamer

replies.bodyText: It seems to be mocked in a test (presumably to avoid more extensive mocking for the grid widget).
replies.author: manstis

timeline.bodyText: @danielzhe Which is the scope of this new method? I don't see this SelectionExtension used previously.Thanks!
timeline.author: yesamer

replies.author: danielzhe

timeline.bodyText: I think also KeyboardOperationSelectTopLeftCell and KeyboardOperationSelectBottomRightCell should extend this, what do you think?
timeline.author: jomarko
timeline.diffHunk:

+public abstract class KeyboardOperationMove extends BaseKeyboardOperation {

replies.bodyText: Well, in fact the logic of the super classes are different. As you may notice, KeyboardOperationSelectTopLeftCell in the method perform calls selectTopLeftCell while the other classes derived from KeyboardOperationMove in the perform method has a common logic. @jomarko
replies.author: danielzhe

timeline.bodyText: We need ofNullable. I am running FDB to demonstrate we need it. It will cause GuidedDecisionTableModellerPresenterTest to fail.
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.message: RHDM-1016: [DMN Designer] Scroll Bars are not updated when keyboard is used for navigation
